response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It comes with a range of features that cater to various needs, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $150, which I think strikes a fair balance between value and price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs. I'm confident it will provide you with excellent value for your investment.", "product_price": 150}
